title: Adobe or LinotYpE?
content:
I just want to know whether the following attached PC font is from Adobe or LinotYpE of Times-Roman.

[Link removed by Moderator.]

As you all here are pros in this field, any info would be much appreciated.

Thanks

 [‹ (x) Sharp edged serif on book cover - ITC Fenice {Simon H}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071231215239/http:/typophile.com/node/40406 "Go to previous forum topic") [Matrix-style wallpaper for Tahni.com ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071231215239/http:/typophile.com/node/39819 "Go to next forum topic")
author: abiel

comments.content: Just by looking at the fontname: LT stands for linotype, so it seems it is a Linotype Standard OTF-font. Std stands for standard.
Please do not post links to illegal and/or shared fonts.
